help_help:
Show every available command. By default, this shows the list of modules.
You can get help on a specific command with `{0}help [command]`, help on a module with `{0}help [module]` and all commands with `{0}help all`
info_help: Shows the bot's version, its owner, the number of servers, and other information.
plugin_help:
Manage the loaded state of a plugin. 
To load the plugin on boot, add `-config`. Example: `{0}plugin load plugins.tools -config`
shutdown_help:
Shutdowns the bot. 
To kill the process, use `{0}shutdown kill`
ban_help:
Ban an user from the server, preventing it from joining again until it is unbanned.
The reason is optional.
kick_help:
Eject an user from the server, allowing it to join again with an invite link.
The reason is optional.
idban_brief: Bans an user via its ID
idban_help:
Ban an user from the server with its Discord ID.
The reason is optional.
unban_help: Unban an user from the server
